member.name: T:NationalDroughtMitigationCenter.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NationalDroughtMitigationCenter.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NationalDroughtMitigationCenter.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:NationalDroughtMitigationCenter.ExceptionManager.HandleApplicationException(System.Object,System.Threading.ThreadExceptionEventArgs)
member.summary: Catches ThreadExceptionEventArgs and passes them to the general application exception handler. It is hooked in Main.

member.name: M:NationalDroughtMitigationCenter.ExceptionManager.HandleApplicationException(System.Object,System.Exception)
member.summary: This method is the event handler for any unhandled exceptions in the application. If it catches any, it will log the exception to the event log. It will then forecably exit. It is hooked in Main.

member.name: M:NationalDroughtMitigationCenter.ExceptionManager.ExtractExceptionInfo(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: This method builds an error string with application, machine, process, and exception information based on the exception read in.
member.param: The exception to gather information from.
Path of the file being parsed.
member.returns: A string with application, machine, process, and exception information.
